The developers of King Legacy are constantly updating the game and providing many new codes. These codes have a significant impact on the experience, especially in the early stages of the game, as they offer a bunch of freebies, including gems, boosts, and cash. Roblox players can scroll down to see the complete list of King Legacy codes, as well as a guide to redeeming them, a list of other games like King Legacy , and information about the game's developers.

Updated January 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: This guide ensures that youâ€™re always informed about the latest codes. Check back frequently to unlock new perks.

How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy

To redeem codes in Roblox: King Legacy , players must follow a few quick steps. To obtain some of the latest supplies from codes, they should input them correctly by copying and pasting the list provided. If a code doesn't work, they should double-check that the spelling is correct. If it still doesn't work, it has likely been redeemed or is no longer available.

  1. Launch King Legacy
  2. Click on the Settings button in the drop-down menu
  3. In the Settings window, click inside the Enter Code box and paste the code
  4. Click Enter to complete the process

King Legacy Tips and Tricks

To begin with, it is necessary to understand that players who want to achieve success must complete many quests. Players can find them in the city. A very important aspect of the game is the selection of enemies by level. Initially, it will be difficult for players to deal with enemies of a higher level, so choose carefully. Using additional skills such as Smash is also very important for victory.

Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy

With thousands of Roblox games available, players often search for something new. The reason for this is that all games get dull over time, and this section aims to help players if and when this occurs. Below, they will find a list of the best Roblox games, like King Legacy :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Shindo Life
  • Ro Ghoul
  • Zo Samurai

About the King Legacy Developers

King Legacy was created by a group of developers called Venture Lagoons. They are pretty popular, and their group on the Roblox website currently has 621K members. Unfortunately, King Legacy is the only game from these developers that is so popular.

item.title: Brawl Stars QR Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
As befits the MOBA genre, in Brawl Stars players need to communicate with each other to win. To do this, you can use different Pins. There are many ways to get them, but the best is to use Brawl Stars QR codes.

These codes can reward you with various free goodies, including Pins and even Icons. However, after a certain time after the release, they become inactive. So you should hurry to use them.

Updated January 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: We take it upon ourselves to keep an eye on the latest Brawl Stars QR codes to make your process of getting valuable rewards much easier. To stay up-to-date on the latest freebies, bookmark this guide to your browser.

All Brawl Stars QR Codes

Working Brawl Stars QR Codes

Scan this code to get a free Icon

Scan this code to get a free Icon

Scan this code to get a free Icon

Scan this code to get a free Pin

Scan this code to get a free Pin

Scan this code to get a free Pin

Scan this code to get a free Pin

Expired Brawl Stars QR Codes

There are no expired QR codes in Brawl Stars . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Brawl Stars gives players a wide variety of different game modes. And while some of them require teamwork, others can be won solo. But in any case, you will want to customize your game profile. This can be done with the help of various Icons and Pins. The latter are used as emotes during matches. And to unlock them at the beginning of the game, you should scan Brawl Stars QR codes.

The developers release these QR codes during updates, events, or just to please the players. The codes contain various rewards, which are mainly cosmetic. But as always, their activity period is limited, so we do not recommend you delay using them.

How to Redeem Brawl Stars QR codes

Using Brawl Stars QR codes is a little different from other mobile games. However, it is still quite easy. You just need to follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Brawl Stars and go through a short tutorial.
  • After that, scan the QR code with your phone's camera and follow the link.
  • Then tap Claim Reward.
  • This will open Brawl Stars , after which you need to tap Claim again to get your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Brawl Stars QR Codes

As with other mobile games, developers release free goodies quite often. But they can easily be missed by players. So, if you want to learn about Brawl Stars QR Codes first-hand, you should visit the official developers's social media pages.

  • Brawl Stars X page
  • Brawl Stars Facebook page
  • Brawl Stars YouTube channel

How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds

Players should follow the few steps mentioned below and claim codes for free:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Fruit Battlegrounds
  2. Choose the option Spin Fruit to enter the store.
  3. Click on the chest.
  4. In the screenâ€™s bottom-left corner, you can see the special window for redeeming codes.
  5. Paste the code here and click the Redeem button. Codes will automatically store rewards on the account.

Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks

Spin Wisely

Players should use gems to spin for fruits and take advantage of the codes provided above to increase their gems count. They'll also want to save and equip rare or legendary fruits for better gameplay.

Use Feature

After 100 spins, players will be guaranteed good fruit. As such, they should keep spinning to make the most of this feature.

Level up efficiently

Using moves repeatedly will lead to them leveling up. Players can either fight other players or use their moves strategically to gain experience points.

Daily rewards

Players should log in daily to collect gems from the daily rewards feature.

Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Fruit Battlegrounds

  • Dragon Warrior Simulator
  • Dragons' Life

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leak Shows New Area in Version 3.1
item.description:
Summary

  • A new batch of Honkai: Star Rail leaks are showing off a new area coming to the newest world of Amphoreus with the Version 3.1 update.
  • The images show off several palacial settings within Amphoreus' new content, as well as important story locations and a potential new Titan.
  • Version 3.1 will also introduce two new playable characters in Mydei and Tribbie, with rumors of a new update to the Divergent Universe game mode.

A new leak from Honkai: Star Rail is showing off a brand-new area within the game's newest world of Amphoreus, expected to be added during Version 3.1. The launch of the fourth playable world within the sci-fi RPG has seen a variety of unique and stunning landscapes for players to traverse throughout the Greek and Roman-themed world. From the towering Titan Kephale to the various time-bending locations found throughout the early portions of the world's story, Amphoreus has brought a wide range of new locales. Now, another location within Amphoreus is being teased.

While Honkai: Star Rail has not revealed many official details about what's to come with Version 3.1, early teasers and leaks have hinted at several new changes. Version 3.1 will welcome two new playable characters to the roster with Mydei and Tribbie, both playing a major role in the story for Version 3.0. The update has also seen a potential new game mode leaked, as well as major changes coming with a new rotation of the Divergent Universe mode. The most recent leak is now hinting at a brand-new location within Amphoreus players can visit during Version 3.1.

Honkai: Star Rail Leak Shows Version 3.1 Area

A recent batch of images shared by prominent HoYoverse leaker Seele Leaks is showing off a plethora of different Honkai: Star Rail locations in Version 3.1. The leak depicts several lavishly decorated interiors, including the main hall and exterior of a palacial area within Amphoreus. The leak also teases several prominent story areas, including a massive crystal atop a pedestal, an ornate throne, and likely another of Amphoreus' main Titans. The new areas are expected to be added to Honkai: Star Rail in Version 3.1, currently rumored to launch on February 25.

Honkai: Star Rail 's stunning new locations are expected to be featured as a major part of the new story content coming during Version 3.1. The Version 3.1 update will see two more members of Amphoreus' "Chrysos Heirs" join the playable roster, with more story content likely connected to the Titans Janus and Nikador. Honkai: Star Rail 's Version 3.1 is also expected to include several side missions with its new areas, with a new update to the Divergent Universe teased and multiple events planned.

Alongside the release of Amphoreus, Honkai: Star Rail also made several smaller changes to the game with its Version 3.0 update. HoYoverse introduced "Wishful Resin" and "Variable Dice" as two new in-game resources, used to help players optimize the sub-stats for their Relics. Ahead of the previously-leaked Divergent Universe update, the game mode is also offering players double Synchronicity Points throughout Version 3.0. Honkai: Star Rail 's first post-Amphoreus update looks to be jam-packed with plenty of content for the game's newest world.

item.title: Synduality: Echo of Ada - How To Find Resources
item.description:
Building up the workshop as a Drifter in SynDuality: Echo of Ada is a lot of costly work. Gathering materials can feel like digging for a needle in a haystack, but there are many shortcuts to finding rare or unusual materials in the game. Hereâ€™s how to find resources using the in-game menus as well as some tips on finding some rarer materials.

All sorts of resources can be found while on expeditions, and they can be used for different purposes. Crafting recipes in the Crafting Station use all resources found in the open world as well as items dropped by Enders and Cradles. Rewards from completing Requests can also yield some materials that are rarer than dropped materials, depending on the difficulty of the Request in progress.

How to Find Resources while on an Expedition in SynDuality: Echo of Ada

The first way is utilizing the Wishlist feature in the Remodel tab in the garage. When you go to the Remodel tab to upgrade various rooms in the Garage, you will notice that each upgrade or start of building a new room requires resources to build up. To register items to the Wishlist, press the key displayed in the lower right corner of the screen, and all components as part of the list to build the room will be registered on the Wishlist. While out on an Expedition, the Magus will tag any nearby items on the HUD with a pink icon and display where they are. Players can also open the Map window during an Expedition and use the arrow keys to navigate to the specific items on the Wishlist that they wish to find. Highlighting the item will put up yellow blobs on the map they have previously explored where those items are commonly found, but they will not always be present upon arrival. Sometimes items can spawn at random if an area is entered and then left.

The other major source of construction resources is just doing quests via the Requests tab in the garage. Completing major quests rewards the player with plenty of money and resources to complete many early construction projects in the Remodel section early on. These quests can vary depending on which organization is requesting it, but objectives will usually be simple tasks like visiting a specific location or slaying a certain number of Enders or Cradles using a specific weapon. For more varied tasks, players may want to look at ways to change factions in SynDuality: Echo of Ada.

Some other ways resources can be found more at random are in chests scattered throughout the world, which can be marked as containing Wishlisted items by the Magus. Enemy Cradles, both Bandits and players, will also drop anything they are carrying depending on the level of the Cradle or just by pure chance. Enders may also randomly drop materials required in certain recipes such as Chaser Fangs or Crawler Cores. Ender Cores have the best chance to drop if players aim directly for the Enderâ€™s yellow weak spot and score Critical Hits as much as possible. Drawing out combat may degrade any materials dropped by an Ender. Mainly, the best ways to find resources is just to interact with the world and find anything you can possibly carry back and complete objectives as well as downing enemies.
